  • Method Details

    • findIntersectionPoint

      LayoutPointInterface findIntersectionPoint(LayoutLine other)
      Finds the intersection between two straight lines which does not have to be on either line. Will return null if lines are parallel (including overlapping). Code adapted from GeeksForGeeks.
      Parameters:
      other - the line for which to find intersection
      Returns:
      the point where the lines intersect, null if there is no unambiguous single point
